summary: TAKATA RECALL - LEXUS IS NOT STEPPING UP TO FIX THIS PROBLEM. I HAVE HAD THIS OPEN RECALL FOR ALMOST A YEAR.  WHEN CALLING LEXUS TO SCHEDULE REPAIR I GET A RESPONSE OF "WE WILL HAVE PARTS IN 2 WEEKS, WE CAN;T TAKE APPOINTMENTS YET!".  THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR A YEAR!!!!.  THERE INTERIM SOLUTION IS TO NOT HAVE ANYONE SIT IN THE FRONT PASSENGER SEAT???  FINE IF THAT WAS FOR A DAY OR TWO -  BUT A YEAR!!!
